column1: 07:46|He awoke with a start. The clock on his bedside table said 7.46 a.m. He cursed
column2: jumped out of bed and dressed. He stuffed his toothbrush and toothpaste in his jacket pocket
column3: and parked outside the station just before 8 a.m. In reception
column4: Ebba beckoned to him.|The Dogs of Riga|Henning Mankell
